content.html:
what's the reason for keeping this->dataPtr->posPids in the for loop? iter->second has a nice performance advantage over another lookup with the operator[] .

In keeping with gazebo style guide, this would become:

  for (auto &iter : this->dataPtr->posPids)
  {
    iter.second.Reset();
  }

  for (auto &iter : this->dataPtr->velPids)
  {
    iter.second.Reset();
  }
